description: This file defines a world-building system with a World model, a function to instantiate a world builder agent, and related classes and imports. It includes detailed prompts and model selection logic for creating complex fictional worlds.

classes.name: World
classes.description: Model representing a fictional world with its key attributes.

methods.name: get_world_builder
methods.description: Returns an instance of the World Builder Agent configured with specified model and debug options.
